search.advanced.all.helptext: Results containing all of the given terms will be prioritized, followed by those with one or more of the terms.
search.advanced.all.label: Any of these words

search.advanced.must.label: Must contain these words
search.advanced.none.label: None of these words
search.advanced.proximity.helptext: Search for two terms within a certain distance of each other. For example, return results with the terms "Bank" and "America" occurring within two words from each other, such as "Bank of America", "Bank in America", even "America has a Bank".
search.advanced.proximity.label: Terms in proximity to each other
search.advanced.title: Advanced Search
search.advanced.variants.helptext: Increase the fuzziness of a search. For example, Wladimir~2 will return not just the term “Wladimir” but also similar spellings such as "Wladimyr" or "Vladimyr". A spelling variant is defined by the number of spelling mistakes that must be made to get from the original word to the variant.
search.advanced.variants.label: Spelling variations
